LanguageData.SSMealSurvivalPackSpicy.label: spicy packaged survival meal
LanguageData.SSMealSurvivalPackSpicy.description: A high-quality packaged meal combined with hot sauce, manufactured for use in survival situations. While it never rots, it can still deteriorate if left outside. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.SSMealTravelPackSpicy.label: spicy packaged travel meal
LanguageData.SSMealTravelPackSpicy.description: A deluxe-quality packaged meal combined with hot sauce, manufactured for use while traveling. While it never rots, it can still deteriorate if left outside. Ideal for traveling.
LanguageData.SSMealSimpleSpicy.label: spicy simple meal
LanguageData.SSMealSimpleSpicy.description: A simple meal quickly cooked from one main ingredient and combined with hot sauce.
LanguageData.SSMealFineSpicy.label: spicy fine meal
LanguageData.SSMealFineSpicy.description: A complex dish assembled with care from a variety of ingredients and combined with hot sauce.
LanguageData.SSMealLavishSpicy.label: spicy lavish meal
LanguageData.SSMealLavishSpicy.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this spicy meal flavoured with hot sauce nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.SSPemmicanSpicy.label: spicy pemmican
LanguageData.SSPemmicanSpicy.description: A preserved mashed mixture of fat and plant food combined with hot sauce. Tastes bland, but not offensive and has a bit of a heat kick. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration. Great for traveling.
